extensionDescription.message: Opens selected bug numbers in bugzilla.mozilla.org (and optionally in GitHub and Jira).

contextMenuItem.description: Title of single context menu item that opens the selected text as bugs in BMO when clicked and no GitHub repos or Jira projects are specified.

contextMenuItem1.description: Title of context menu item that opens the selected text as bugs in BMO when clicked.

contextMenuItem2.description: Title of context menu item that opens the selected text as bugs in GitHub (using options) when clicked.

contextMenuItem3.description: Title of context menu item that opens the selected text as item in Jira (using options) when clicked.
